irCharMib.name: irCharMib
irCharMib.contactinfo: Postal: MRV Communications, Inc. 295 Foster Street Littleton, MA 01460
irCharMib.description: This is the MRV LX Character MIB module.

irCharNumber.name: irCharNumber
irCharNumber.description: The number of entries in irCharPortTable.

irCharPortTable.name: irCharPortTable
irCharPortTable.description: A list of character port entries.

irCharPortIndex.name: irCharPortIndex
irCharPortIndex.description: An index value that uniquely identifies a port.

irCharPortAccessType.name: irCharPortAccessType
irCharPortAccessType.description: The access type value for the port.

irCharPortFlowControl.name: irCharPortFlowControl
irCharPortFlowControl.description: The flow control mechanism configured for the port.

irCharPortStopBits.name: irCharPortStopBits
irCharPortStopBits.description: The number of stop bits configured for the port.

irCharPortParity.name: irCharPortParity
irCharPortParity.description: The parity configured for the port.

irCharPortBitsPerChar.name: irCharPortBitsPerChar
irCharPortBitsPerChar.description: The number of bits per character.

irCharPortAutoDial.name: irCharPortAutoDial
irCharPortAutoDial.description: The auto dial setting for the port. This object has been deprecated and will be removed in the next release.

irCharPortAutoHangup.name: irCharPortAutoHangup
irCharPortAutoHangup.description: The auto hangup setting for the port.

irCharPortAutobaud.name: irCharPortAutobaud
irCharPortAutobaud.description: The autobaud status for the port.

irCharPortInSignalCts.name: irCharPortInSignalCts
irCharPortInSignalCts.description: The current value of the input CTS signal.

irCharPortInSignalDsr.name: irCharPortInSignalDsr
irCharPortInSignalDsr.description: The current value of the input DSR signal.

irCharPortInSignalDcd.name: irCharPortInSignalDcd
irCharPortInSignalDcd.description: The current value of the input DCD signal.

irCharPortOutSignalRts.name: irCharPortOutSignalRts
irCharPortOutSignalRts.description: The current value of the output RTS signal.

irCharPortOutSignalDtr.name: irCharPortOutSignalDtr
irCharPortOutSignalDtr.description: The current value of the output DTR signal.

irCharPortSpeed.name: irCharPortSpeed
irCharPortSpeed.description: The port speed in bits per second.

irCharPortPrompt.name: irCharPortPrompt
irCharPortPrompt.description: An administratively assigned prompt for the port.

irCharPortBreak.name: irCharPortBreak
irCharPortBreak.description: The break status for the port.

irCharPortSpecialBreakString.name: irCharPortSpecialBreakString
irCharPortSpecialBreakString.description: An administratively assigned special break string for the port.

irCharPortSpecialBreak.name: irCharPortSpecialBreak
irCharPortSpecialBreak.description: The special break status for the port.

irCharPortInboundAuth.name: irCharPortInboundAuth
irCharPortInboundAuth.description: The inbound authentication status for the port.

irCharPortOutboundAuth.name: irCharPortOutboundAuth
irCharPortOutboundAuth.description: The outbound authentication status for the port.

irCharPortAuthFallback.name: irCharPortAuthFallback
irCharPortAuthFallback.description: The Authentication fallback attempts for the port.

irCharPortRadiusAcct.name: irCharPortRadiusAcct
irCharPortRadiusAcct.description: The Radius accounting status for the port.

irCharPortTacacsAcct.name: irCharPortTacacsAcct
irCharPortTacacsAcct.description: The Tacacs accounting status for the port.

irCharPortTransparent.name: irCharPortTransparent
irCharPortTransparent.description: The transparent status for the port.

irCharPortDataBufferSize.name: irCharPortDataBufferSize
irCharPortDataBufferSize.description: An administratively assigned data buffer log size

irCharPortDataBufferSyslog.name: irCharPortDataBufferSyslog
irCharPortDataBufferSyslog.description: The data buffer syslog status for the port.

irCharPortDataBufferDisplay.name: irCharPortDataBufferDisplay
irCharPortDataBufferDisplay.description: The data buffer display status for the port.

irCharPortDataBufferTimeStamp.name: irCharPortDataBufferTimeStamp
irCharPortDataBufferTimeStamp.description: The data buffer time stamp status for the port.

irCharPortTelnetPort.name: irCharPortTelnetPort
irCharPortTelnetPort.description: The configured port used to telnet to the device attached to this port.

irCharPortSshPort.name: irCharPortSshPort
irCharPortSshPort.description: The configured port used to SSH to the device attached to this port.

irCharPortStatsTable.name: irCharPortStatsTable
irCharPortStatsTable.description: A list of character port stats entries.

irCharPortTransmitBytes.name: irCharPortTransmitBytes
irCharPortTransmitBytes.description: The number of bytes transmitted on the port.

irCharPortReceiveBytes.name: irCharPortReceiveBytes
irCharPortReceiveBytes.description: The number of bytes received on the port.

irCharPortFrameErrors.name: irCharPortFrameErrors
irCharPortFrameErrors.description: The number of frame errors on the port.

irCharPortOverrunErrors.name: irCharPortOverrunErrors
irCharPortOverrunErrors.description: The number of overrun errors on the port.

irCharPortParityErrors.name: irCharPortParityErrors
irCharPortParityErrors.description: The number of parity errors on the port.

irTempPortIndex.name: irTempPortIndex
irTempPortIndex.description: The port on which the temp sensor is configured.

irTempSensorIndex.name: irTempSensorIndex
irTempSensorIndex.description: A unique value that identifies a specific configured temp sensor.

irTempValueUnits.name: irTempValueUnits
irTempValueUnits.description: This object indicates the units for the temperature value.

irTempTrapSeverity.name: irTempTrapSeverity
irTempTrapSeverity.description: The severity value to be sent in the threshold trap.

irTempHysteresis.name: irTempHysteresis
irTempHysteresis.description: After crossing a threshold, the delta by which the caliberated value must drop within the normal range before the alarm condition is cleared (i.e. a cleared alarm is generated).

irHumiditySensorTable.name: irHumiditySensorTable
irHumiditySensorTable.description: A list of humidity sensor entries.

irHumidityPortIndex.name: irHumidityPortIndex
irHumidityPortIndex.description: The port on which the humidity sensor is configured.

irHumiditySensorIndex.name: irHumiditySensorIndex
irHumiditySensorIndex.description: A unique value that identifies a specific configured humidity sensor.

irHumidityValue.name: irHumidityValue
irHumidityValue.description: The current humidity value (as a percentage).

irHumidityTrapSeverity.name: irHumidityTrapSeverity
irHumidityTrapSeverity.description: The severity value to be sent in the threshold trap.

irHumidityHysteresis.name: irHumidityHysteresis
irHumidityHysteresis.description: After crossing a threshold, the delta by which the caliberated value must drop within the normal range before the alarm condition is cleared (i.e. a cleared alarm is generated).

irPowerTable.name: irPowerTable
irPowerTable.description: A list of power port entries.

irPowerModuleType.name: irPowerModuleType
irPowerModuleType.description: The type of power module attached to the power port.

irPowerCurrentLoad.name: irPowerCurrentLoad
irPowerCurrentLoad.description: An Ascii string indicating the total unit current load, in Amps.

irPowerOutletCount.name: irPowerOutletCount
irPowerOutletCount.description: The number of power outlets on the module.

irPowerCurrentLoadA.name: irPowerCurrentLoadA
irPowerCurrentLoadA.description: An Ascii string indicating the current load, in Amps, of input feed A. Note that this info is available only on certain models. A value of 'N/A' indicates that this information is not available.

irPowerCurrentLoadB.name: irPowerCurrentLoadB
irPowerCurrentLoadB.description: An Ascii string indicating the current load, in Amps, of input feed B. Note that this info is available only on certain models. A value of 'N/A' indicates that this information is not available.

irPowerCurrentLoadC.name: irPowerCurrentLoadC
irPowerCurrentLoadC.description: An Ascii string indicating the current load, in Amps, of input feed C. Note that this info is available only on certain models. A value of 'N/A' indicates that this information is not available.

irPowerOutletTable.name: irPowerOutletTable
irPowerOutletTable.description: A list of Power Outlet entries.

irPowerPortIndex.name: irPowerPortIndex
irPowerPortIndex.description: An index which uniquely identifies a physical power port.

irPowerOutletIndex.name: irPowerOutletIndex
irPowerOutletIndex.description: An index which uniquely identifies an outlet on a power outlet port.

irPowerOutletName.name: irPowerOutletName
irPowerOutletName.description: A name used to identify this power outlet.

irPowerOutletStatus.name: irPowerOutletStatus
irPowerOutletStatus.description: The status of the power outlet.

irPowerOutletAction.name: irPowerOutletAction
irPowerOutletAction.description: A read of this object always returns the value other(1). Setting it to one of the other values causes the corresponding action to take place.

irPowerOutletCurrentLoad.name: irPowerOutletCurrentLoad
irPowerOutletCurrentLoad.description: An Ascii string indicating the current load, in Amps, for this outlet. A value of 'N/A' indicates that this information is not available.

irTcpPipeTable.name: irTcpPipeTable
irTcpPipeTable.description: A list of TcpPipe port entries.

irTcpPipeRemoteIpAddress.name: irTcpPipeRemoteIpAddress
irTcpPipeRemoteIpAddress.description: The IP address of the remote end of the TCP connection.

irTcpPipeRemoteTcpPort.name: irTcpPipeRemoteTcpPort
irTcpPipeRemoteTcpPort.description: The TCP port number for the remote end of the TCP connection.

irTcpPipeWindowSize.name: irTcpPipeWindowSize
irTcpPipeWindowSize.description: The TCP window size to use for the TCP connection.

irTcpPipeConnRetryCount.name: irTcpPipeConnRetryCount
irTcpPipeConnRetryCount.description: The TCP connection retry count to use for the TCP connection.

irModemCfgTable.name: irModemCfgTable
irModemCfgTable.description: A list of modem config entries.

irModemIndex.name: irModemIndex
irModemIndex.description: An index value that uniquely identifies a modem.

irModemTimeout.name: irModemTimeout
irModemTimeout.description: The number of seconds to wait to detect remote end setting DSR signal high before giving up trying to establish a call.

irModemRetry.name: irModemRetry
irModemRetry.description: The number of times to try establishing a call.

irModemState.name: irModemState
irModemState.description: This indicates whether the modem is enabled or disabled on a port.

irModemPooling.name: irModemPooling
irModemPooling.description: This indicates whether modem pooling is enabled or disabled.

irModemDialNumber.name: irModemDialNumber
irModemDialNumber.description: The phone number to dial when setting up a call.

irInternalModemPort.name: irInternalModemPort
irInternalModemPort.description: The physical port to which an internal modem is attached. A value of 0 indicates there is no internal modem present.

irInternalModemType.name: irInternalModemType
irInternalModemType.description: The type of modem module installed in the system.

irLdAlarmConfigTable.name: irLdAlarmConfigTable
irLdAlarmConfigTable.description: A list of ldam alarm port config entries.

irLdAlarmConfigEntry.name: irLdAlarmConfigEntry
irLdAlarmConfigEntry.description: An ldam alarm port config entry.

irLdAlarmPointIndex.name: irLdAlarmPointIndex
irLdAlarmPointIndex.description: An integer which uniquely identifies an alarm point on this port.

irLdAlarmName.name: irLdAlarmName
irLdAlarmName.description: The name assigned to the alarm point.

irLdAlarmDescription.name: irLdAlarmDescription
irLdAlarmDescription.description: A user configurable alarm point description string.

irLdAlarmContactState.name: irLdAlarmContactState
irLdAlarmContactState.description: The current state of the alarm point contacts.

irLdAlarmContactFaultState.name: irLdAlarmContactFaultState
irLdAlarmContactFaultState.description: The contact state (open or closed) which indicates the fault condition. If the value of this object and irLdAlarmContactState is the same, then the alarm point has been triggered.

irLdAlarmTrapStatus.name: irLdAlarmTrapStatus
irLdAlarmTrapStatus.description: This indicates whether an snmp trap will be generated when this alarm point is generated.

irLdAlarmTrapSeverity.name: irLdAlarmTrapSeverity
irLdAlarmTrapSeverity.description: The trap severity assigned to this alarm point. This value will be sent when an alarm fires and an snmp trap is generated.

irLdAlarmCount.name: irLdAlarmCount
irLdAlarmCount.description: The number of times the alarm point has been generated since the LX was started.

irLdAlarmTimestamp.name: irLdAlarmTimestamp
irLdAlarmTimestamp.description: A timestamp string indicating the time the last alarm was generated. A null string indicates that the alarm point has not been triggered.

irLdControlConfigTable.name: irLdControlConfigTable
irLdControlConfigTable.description: A list of ldam control port config entries.

irLdControlConfigEntry.name: irLdControlConfigEntry
irLdControlConfigEntry.description: An ldam control port config entry.

irLdControlPointIndex.name: irLdControlPointIndex
irLdControlPointIndex.description: An integer which uniquely identifies a control point on this port.

irLdControlName.name: irLdControlName
irLdControlName.description: The name assigned to the control point.

irLdControlDescription.name: irLdControlDescription
irLdControlDescription.description: A user configurable control point description string.

irLdControlState.name: irLdControlState
irLdControlState.description: The configured control state (deassert or assert).

irLdControlEnergizedState.name: irLdControlEnergizedState
irLdControlEnergizedState.description: The configured energized state (deassert or assert). If the value of this object and irLdControlState is the same, then the operational state will be on.

irRs485PortTable.name: irRs485PortTable
irRs485PortTable.description: A list of RS485 character port entries.

irRs485PortIndex.name: irRs485PortIndex
irRs485PortIndex.description: An index value that uniquely identifies an RS485 port. This value maps to the same index in the irCharPortTable.

irRs485PortDuplexMode.name: irRs485PortDuplexMode
irRs485PortDuplexMode.description: The duplex mode for this RS485 port.

irRs485PortEchoMode.name: irRs485PortEchoMode
irRs485PortEchoMode.description: The echo mode for this RS4585 port. This is used when irRs485PortDuplexMode object is set to half(2).

irRs485PortTransmitter.name: irRs485PortTransmitter
irRs485PortTransmitter.description: The transmitter setting for this RS4585 port. This is used when irRs485PortDuplexMode object is set to full(1).

irGsmPortTable.name: irGsmPortTable
irGsmPortTable.description: A list of GSM/GPRS port entries.

irGsmPortIndex.name: irGsmPortIndex
irGsmPortIndex.description: An index value that uniquely identifies an GSM/GPRS port. This value maps to the same index in the irCharPortTable.

irUpsType.name: irUpsType
irUpsType.description: The ups type. It indicates the protocol used to communicate with the ups. A value of smart(1) means use Ascii based commands. A value of simple(2) means use RS232 signals (DTR, CTS). Note that, when irUpsType is simple, only irUpsStatus info is available.

irUpsStatus.name: irUpsStatus
irUpsStatus.description: The ups status. A value of offline(1) indicates the ups is not providing power to the attached devices. A value of online(2) indicates the ups is providing power to the attached devices.

irUpsCharge.name: irUpsCharge
irUpsCharge.description: The ups charge, as a percentage.

irUpsLoad.name: irUpsLoad
irUpsLoad.description: The current load, as a percentage.

irUpsLife.name: irUpsLife
irUpsLife.description: The ups life (time remaining), in minutes.
